Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Membro della Redazione di GENIUS, Rivista di studi giuridici sull'orientamento sessuale e l'identità di genere

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Workshop on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the availability of European Law Online- European Court of Auditors, Luxembourg-Kirchberg Topic: Dissemination of EU Court decisions and efficiency

2013, Relatrice al 6th World Congress on Family Law and Children's Rights Sydney, Australia Argomento: LGBTI Discrimination and parent – child relationship : Cross border mobility of rainbow families in the European Union

10-11 luglio 2014, Speaker alla conferenza internazionale: “Dignity and Rights of the Elderly, The John Marshall Law School, Chicago, Illinois, USA. Argomento: “Medical treatment and expression of the consent of the elderly not able to consent: a comparative analysis of the case law in the countries of the Council of Europe”
11 febbraio 2015, Speaker alla conferenza internazionale : LGBTIQ Empowering Realities, Challenging Homophobia and Transphobia”, Università di Torino Argomento:

Relatrice alla International Conference on Religion and Equality, June 9-11 2015, Bar-Ilan University, Faculty of Law, Tel Aviv (Israel) Argomento: The Cultural Impact of Islamic Mass Immigration on the Italian Legal System

7 luglio 2016 Speaker alla conferenza internazionale: “Culture, Dispute Resolution and the Modernised Family”, at King's College, London; Argomento: Birth Abroad by Contract: The International Debate on Surrogacy;

Relatrice alla conferenza annuale della Society of Legal Scholars University of Oxford, 'Legislation and the Role of the Judiciary' Argomento: Birth Abroad by Contract: The International Debate on Surrogacy;

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Periodo di ricerca presso il CERDP (Centre d'Etudes et de Recherches en Droit Privé) sul diritto civile e delle obbligazioni francese dal novembre 2006 al febbraio 2007
2011, 4 – 8 April: Visiting Professor at Bifrost University - Borgarnes (Iceland) - Erasmus Teaching Mobility Program
2013, 22-30 November:Visiting Professorf at Banku Augstkola School of Business and Finance, Riga (Latvia) – Erasmus Teaching Mobility Program
